actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to provide funds for wages of employees of certain insolvent railroads under the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Labor, under the Comprehensive Employment Training Act of 1973, to pay the wages of unemployed or underemployed employees of any railroad under bankruptcy reorganization.

titles.title: A bill to provide funds for wages of employees of certain insolvent railroads under the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973.
